name: A Proof of Concept (Humanity1Studios)
description:
You've been invited to come talk to a friend. He's been working on something and really needs an ear.

Will you listen?

-----------------------------------------------

A Proof of Concept is a short (~60  minute) game about interacting with a person, and the struggles they encounter along their journey of making their first game. Part FMV, part visual novel, a splash of point and click and a pinch of moral choices make up this unique experience sure to leave you thinking about how you've acted.

Subtitles available in English & Czech (message me if you'd like additional languages).

&dash---------------------------------------------

This game was made using the Charles Engine assets pack in Unity over the course of a year. It uses only one actor and one scene, edited with Wondershare Filmora and assembled entirely on a Surface Pro 2.
